resources.string: Welcome to Riddle Quiz! Answer all of the questions before time runs out.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What is full of holes but still holds water?sponge
What has many keys but can’t open a single lock?piano
What belongs to you, but other people use it more than you do?name
What is tall when it is young and short when it is old?candle
What is always in front of you but can’t be seen?future
What goes up but never comes down?age
David’s parents have three sons: Snap, Crackle, and what’s the name of the third son?david
Where does today come before yesterday?dictionary
What has a thumb and four fingers, but is not a hand?glove
What building has the most stories?library
What has four wheels and flies?garbage truck
If there are 3 apples and you take away 2, how many apples do you have?2
